properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In my spirit the anointing dwells, Oh, the anointing dwells and teaches everything. In my spirit the anointing dwells And ever teaches everything.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In my spirit the anointing dwells, Oh, the anointing dwells and teaches everything. In my spirit the anointing dwells And ever teaches everything.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}With God’s own essence it anoints me, God to know deep inwardly, That I may have His very element Fully saturating me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In my spirit the anointing dwells, Oh, the anointing dwells and teaches everything. In my spirit the anointing dwells And ever teaches everything.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}In my spirit the anointing dwells, Oh, the anointing dwells and teaches everything. In my spirit the anointing dwells And ever teaches everything.{/lang-eng}
